it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class ControllerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.ControllerTest

  • public class ControllerTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Test for Controller class This class cannot be fully tested. Only simple behaviors are tested. Testing this class would mean simulating the game. Many of the methods and behaviors of Controller are tested by other tests. Since the Controller follows the State Design Pattern, part of its behavior is mainly tested in the State tests. The remaining behavior is not worth testing, as it would involve creating Messages of all types and exchanging them, which in practice is playing the game.
    Author:
    Jacopo Pio Gargano
